languages.text: {n}Вы тотчас узнаете в нем скульптора, предлагавшего вытесать ваш лик из тассерция. Старик словно не замечает вас — все его внимание поглощено странным алтарем.{/n}
{n}At once, you recognise him as the sculptor who offered to carve your visage out of thassertium. The old man does not seem to notice you — all his attention is focused on the strange altar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы тотчас узнаете в нем скульптора, предлагавшего вытесать ваш лик из тассерция. Старик словно не замечает вас — все его внимание поглощено странным алтарем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At once, you recognise him as the sculptor who offered to carve your visage out of thassertium. The old man does not seem to notice you — all his attention is focused on the strange altar.{/n}

{n}At once, you recognise him as the sculptor who offered to carve your visage out of thassertium. The old man does not seem to notice you — all his attention is focused on the strange altar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你一眼就认出来，那个老人就是提出要用塔瑟拉水晶为你雕塑的雕刻师。不过，老人似乎并没有注意到你，他所有注意力都集中在那个古怪的祭坛上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At once, you recognise him as the sculptor who offered to carve your visage out of thassertium. The old man does not seem to notice you — all his attention is focused on the strange altar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你一眼就认出来，那个老人就是提出要用塔瑟拉水晶为你雕塑的雕刻师。不过，老人似乎并没有注意到你，他所有注意力都集中在那个古怪的祭坛上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Reconoces en el acto al escultor que se ofreció a tallar tu efigie en thassertio. El anciano no parece reparar en tu presencia. Solo tiene ojos para el extraño altar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At once, you recognise him as the sculptor who offered to carve your visage out of thassertium. The old man does not seem to notice you — all his attention is focused on the strange altar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Reconoces en el acto al escultor que se ofreció a tallar tu efigie en thassertio. El anciano no parece reparar en tu presencia. Solo tiene ojos para el extraño altar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Anında tanıdığın adamın çehreni tasertiyumdan oymayı teklif eden heykeltıraş olduğunu görüyorsun. Tüm odağı garip sunakta olan yaşlı adam seni fark etmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At once, you recognise him as the sculptor who offered to carve your visage out of thassertium. The old man does not seem to notice you — all his attention is focused on the strange altar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Anında tanıdığın adamın çehreni tasertiyumdan oymayı teklif eden heykeltıraş olduğunu görüyorsun. Tüm odağı garip sunakta olan yaşlı adam seni fark etmiyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}すぐに、あなたは、彼がタッセリウムにあなたの顔を彫ろうとした彫刻家であることに気づく。その老人は、奇妙な祭壇だけを見ている。あなたに気づいていないようである。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At once, you recognise him as the sculptor who offered to carve your visage out of thassertium. The old man does not seem to notice you — all his attention is focused on the strange altar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}すぐに、あなたは、彼がタッセリウムにあなたの顔を彫ろうとした彫刻家であることに気づく。その老人は、あなたに気づいていないようである。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous reconnaissez immédiatement le sculpteur qui a proposé de sculpter votre visage dans du thassertium. Le vieil homme ne semble pas vous remarquer, toute son attention est accaparée par l'étrange autel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At once, you recognise him as the sculptor who offered to carve your visage out of thassertium. The old man does not seem to notice you — all his attention is focused on the strange altar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous reconnaissez immédiatement le sculpteur qui a proposé de sculpter votre visage dans du thassertium. Le vieil homme ne semble pas vous remarquer, toute son attention est accaparée par l'étrange autel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erkennst ihn augenblicklich als den Skulpteur, der angeboten hat, dein Antlitz aus Thassertium zu meißeln. Der alte Mann scheint dich gar nicht zu bemerken – seine gesamte Aufmerksamkeit gilt dem seltsamen Altar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At once, you recognise him as the sculptor who offered to carve your visage out of thassertium. The old man does not seem to notice you — all his attention is focused on the strange altar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erkennst ihn augenblicklich als den Skulpteur, der angeboten hat, dein Antlitz aus Thassertium zu meißeln. Der alte Mann scheint dich gar nicht zu bemerken – seine gesamte Aufmerksamkeit gilt dem seltsamen Altar.{/n}
